name: Layout - Uses flexbox for navigation
message: The navigation should use flexbox for layout

name: Layout - Uses grid for main content
message: The main content should use CSS Grid for layout

name: Typography - Defines font family for body
message: Set a sans-serif font family for the body text

name: Typography - Headings have proper font size
message: Use relative units (rem) for heading font sizes

name: Color - Has proper contrast for accessibility
message: Use a dark text color (#333) for good contrast

name: Color - Uses brand colors
message: Use the brand blue color (#4285f4) for the header

name: Responsive - Media query for mobile devices
message: Include a media query for mobile devices (max-width: 768px)

name: Animation - Button has hover effect
message: Add a scale transform effect to buttons on hover

name: Spacing - Container has proper padding
message: Add padding of at least 20px to the container

name: Card styling - Uses shadow effect
message: Add a box-shadow effect to cards using rgba colors for depth
